pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Mark Rutte, Prime Minister of the Netherlands | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with Mark Rutte, Prime Minister of the Netherlands. They discussed recent developments with respect to global steel and aluminum trade and the importance of upholding a rules-based approach to international trade.

They also spoke about political developments in Europe and on international peace and security cooperation.

The Prime Minister and Prime Minister Rutte emphasized the important relationship between Canada and the Netherlands and discussed opportunities for future collaboration.
